additionalnotes.value: Iron-deficiency Anemia in Chronic Kidney Disease.
Iron-deficiency Anemia in Chronic Kidney Disease. Administer a second dose 2 to 8 days later.

population.value: ADULT, weighing 50 kg or less with a baseline Hgb greater than 100 to 120 g/L.
ADULT, weighing 50 kg or less with a baseline Hgb less than 100 g/L.

ADULT, weighing greater than 50 kg with a baseline Hgb greater than 100 to 120 g/L.
